kesako.watcher.runnable

Class IntervalDBWork

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.watcher.runnable.IntervalDBWork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexFileErrorProcess, IndexFileProcess, ListSourceProcess, MetaFileProcess, SourceWatcher

    public abstract class IntervalDBWork
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Abstract class that construct a new interval thread that will run on the given interval with the given name.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

      • giveThreadName

        public static java.lang.String giveThreadName(java.lang.String nom)
        Return a valid Thread name. A Thread name is a string prefix by "Th_". If name is not prefixed by "Th_", the String "Th_" is added in front of name.
        Parameters:
        nom - name of the thread. If name is not prefixed by "Th_", the String "Th_" is added in front of name.
        Returns:
        the valid thread name.
